# Random Favorite (Synth Riders) (by VRFlad)

## Description

Allows Streamer.bot to pick a random synth riders song from your favourites and to request it automatically.

## Installation

This setup allows an easy way to add a random favorite to Synth Riders with Streamer.bot without any complicated maintenence and should allow for a one and done setup.

Copy the text from the code box below into the `Import` box in Streamer.bot to add these to your action library:

```text

```
![add-favorite-synth-riders-import.png](/extensions/add-favorite-synth-riders/images/add-favorite-synth-riders-import.png)

## Configuration
Update the path to your synth riders folder (the code will let you know if it is incorrect). 

![add-favorite-synth-riders-path.png](/extensions/add-favorite-synth-riders/images/add-favorite-synth-riders-path.png)


The code will set `Variable` `songrequest` that you can use to do a custom message or Twitchspeaker message.
